Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.observer.ModelObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.model.Game
public class Game
extends ModelObservable
Contains the needed information on the state of the game. Works as the main entry point for the Controller.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Game​(Board board)
    Creates a new Game class, instantiating a new Board and a structure for Players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addGod​(String name, Player player)
    Decorates the turn with the gods, already in order.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(Board board)
      Creates a new Game class, instantiating a new Board and a structure for Players. At the time of instantiation, there is no currentPlayer, which has to bet set using setCurrentPlayer(Player)
      Parameters:
      board - Reference to the board to be used throughout the game.

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      public void addObserver​(@NotNull @NotNull ModelObserver observer)
      Adds an observer to the observers set.
      Overrides:
      addObserver in class ModelObservable
      Parameters:
      observer - Reference to the observer being added.

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers​(ModelUpdate message)
      Calls the method ModelObserver.update(ModelUpdate) for each ModelObserver in the observers set, notifying a ModelUpdate message.
      Overrides:
      notifyObservers in class ModelObservable
      Parameters:
      message - Message notified to observers.

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver​(@NotNull @NotNull ModelObserver observer)
      Removes an observer to the observers set.
      Overrides:
      removeObserver in class ModelObservable
      Parameters:

    • getRemainingGods

      public ArrayList<String> getRemainingGods()

      public ArrayList<String> getAlreadyChosenGods()

    • addRemainingGod

      public void addRemainingGod​(String god)
      Adds a given god to the list of possible gods, for the next player to chose from.
      Parameters:
      god - God chosen to play in the current game.

    • loser

      public Player loser()
      Checks if there is any player who lost.
      Returns:
      Player who lost if there is any, null if there is not.

    • generateSlimBoard

      public SlimBoard generateSlimBoard()
      Generates a main model update. Contains a model snapshot at a given moment.
      Returns:
      Encapsulated info about the board.

    • getPlayerNumber

      public int getPlayerNumber()
      Returns the number of active players.
      Returns:
      Number of players currently in the game.

    • setCurrentPlayerByName

      public void setCurrentPlayerByName​(String name)

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • getPlayersName

      public ArrayList<String> getPlayersName()

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Adds a Player to the structure of active players.
      Parameters:
      player - - Existing player to be added to the game.

    • addWorker

      public void addWorker​(Player player, Sex sex, int x, int y)
      Adds a new worker, associated to the given player.
      Parameters:
      player - Player adding the worker.
      sex - Worker's sex.
      x - x coordinate.
      y - y coordinate.

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer()
      Sets the next player among the data structure of players, which is already in the right turn order.

    • setRandomPlayer

      public void setRandomPlayer()
      Sets a random player as the most god like player, so that he will be starting chosing all the gods cards.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(Player player)
      Removes a given player after he lost. All his workers are eliminated from the board.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to be removed.

    • getEliminatedPlayerName

      public String getEliminatedPlayerName()

    • setGamePhase

      public void setGamePhase​(GamePhase gamePhase)

    • getGamePhase

      public GamePhase getGamePhase()

    • addGod

      public void addGod​(String name, Player player)
      Decorates the turn with the gods, already in order.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the god.
      player - Reference to the player the god must be attached to.
